ecosystem_subtitle: Major players shaping the future from the Pink City.
partner_p1_desc: The National Centre for Space Studies (CNES) proposes and implements French space policy. The Toulouse Space Centre is its largest technical site, driving key European missions.
partner_p2_desc: Airbus Defence and Space is a global leader, assembling major telecommunications and observation satellites in its giant clean rooms in Toulouse.
partner_p3_desc: Thales Alenia Space is a world reference for navigation and telecom satellites, and builds pressurized modules for the ISS and Lunar Gateway.
partner_p4_desc: ISAE-SUPAERO is the world-leading aerospace engineering school, training the elite of the industry and fostering cutting-edge research.
partner_p5_desc: CitÃ© de l'Espace is Europe's premier space theme park, inspiring millions with life-size rockets and immersive exhibitions.
bh_subtitle: Real-time astrophysical simulation of a Kerr black hole. Visual data based on Luminet models (1979).
footer_desc: The reference platform to follow news, innovations, and missions of the European space industry.
bh_webgl_unsupported: Your browser does not support WebGL, which is required for the black hole simulation.
